author: Hoffmann, Christian, fl. 1668-1673
title: Umbra in luce: sive consensus et dissensus religionum profanarum, Judaismi, Samaritanismi muhammedismi, Gingis-chanismi ... cum veritate Christiana, sub umbellâ ... dn. Joh. Ernesti Gerhardi ... à M. Christiano Hoffmanno ... dispicietur in phrontisterio m
